content: I have rebuilt the posted IGs at http://hl7.org.au/fhir to conform to the standard layout / package mgmt etc. As part of that, I had to move things around. I believe I left redirects in place everywhere
please let me know if you see any issues
@Brett Esler I fixed the paths in the home page, but I think it would be better if it referenced the history pages that each IG has now
